heading: Executive Committee 20/21
introduction: The Annual General Meeting of the Association for the year 2021 was held on the 13th of February 2021, at the College Main Hall.
Mr. Senaka Alawattegama, the sitting President, agreed to continue for another year, completing the two year term of presidency, as provisioned in the Associationâ€™s Constitution.
The AGM attended by over 100 members, was conducted in strict adherence to the Covid 19 health and safety guidelines.
